name: Kazaria houston
coverLetter: A little bit about myself, my name is kazaria, I have experience in trimming, budtending, management, handling inventory and product placement as well as business promotion (social media, personal connections and referances) handling invoices from vendors, bud tending, and reception. mmj managing dispensary experience for about 3 years and budtending experience for 6 years on and off. I am looking to enhance my skill sets. If you hire me it will be a great platform to showcase my skills, whatever goals I set I ensure to complete them within stipulated time. I have my own transportation so I am highly punctual. I have a valid doctors recomendation and california ID. I am a team player but also am comfortable with handling tasks on my own. I am very neat and organized and love making sure that things are very clean and tidy in my work space. I have full time availability 7 days a week currently I am interested in working full time hours and willing to do overtime as well as nights and weekends. Thank you for your consideration and I look forward to hearing from you.
